content: I need to make it an early night, so I'm thinking ahead. Looking for something simple and modest cost; I'm also happy to be told to attend something juicy. @Lloyd McKenzie @Grahame Grieve @Virginia Lorenzi @Debi Willis @Abigail Watson @Pooja Babbrah @Rien Wertheim @Ricky Bloomfield @Keith Boone anyone?
Grahame and I are booked tonight I'm afraid.
The Dutch are meeting in the bar. I'll be there. Welcome to join us.
"The" bar? I'll be there, if you say which one and when-ish!
Wish I could join for dinner, but I'm booked. I'll try to meet you all in the bar for a drink!
I might stop by the bar for a drink.
This place has at least 3 places that serve alcohol ... I'll take a guess at one

I'm with the Dutch in the impossibly loud High Velocity sports bar, back room. This will not last long. :slight_smile:

(Not to mention that they're speaking Dutch!)

So, I'm still looking for simple dinner suggestions!
